newsitem.title: UK: Pizza Hut to create 5,000 jobs in Britain.
newsitem.headline: Pizza Hut to create 5,000 jobs in Britain.

text.p: Pizza Hut, the restaurant chain owned by softdrink and snackfoods giant PepsiCo, said Wednesday it will expand its operations in Britain by 150 outlets and add 5,000 new jobs over the next four years.
Pizza Hut's British operation is jointly owned by PepsiCo and Whitbread Plc, the British brewing and leisure group. It currently operates 350 British outlets employing 11,200 people.
Pizza Hut said the recruitment programme would cover all levels, both full and part-time, from regional area management to restaurant staff.
